Header2: Students Portal - For All Your Student Needs
Footer1: DocuSign: It’s time to agree better
Footer2: DocuSign helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on and manage agreements.

Card1.Title:
Change
a Major/Minor Field
Card1.Description: Submit a form requesting changes to your major and/or minor fields of study.
Card1.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Update recipient information
  • Create envelope from HTML Import
  • Fill tab data
  • Embedded signing (recipient view)

Card2.Title:
Request
an Unofficial Transcript
Card2.Description: Get your unofficial transcript in seconds.
Card2.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Creating a clickwrap
  • Embedding clickwrap on your site

Card3.Title:
Sign-up
for Extracurricular Activities
Card3.Description: One stop shop for all your non-academics passions.
Card3.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Update recipient information
  • Create envelope from HTML import
  • Fill tab data
  • Embedded signing (recipient view)
